title: Android Quiz App issue
body:
i am developing simple quiz app with checkboxes, radiobutton and free text response. However, i am having a problem with the code, whenever i click radiobutton my app crash. Can someone help me to fix the code? 

public void addListenerOnButtonClick() {

    estonia = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.estonia);
    india = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.india);
    belgium = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.belgium);
    austria = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.austria);
    kl = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.kl);
    selangor = (CheckBox) findViewById(R.id.selangor);
    Button answerButton = (Button) findViewById(R.id.answerButton);
    answer = (EditText) findViewById(R.id.answer);
    final RadioButton correctAnswer = (RadioButton) findViewById(R.id.radioButton1);


    answerButton.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
        @Override
        public void onClick(View view) {
            StringBuilder answerButton = new StringBuilder();
            answerButton.append("Selected Answer:");
            score = 0;

            if (estonia.isChecked() && austria.isChecked() && belgium.isChecked()) {
                answerButton.append("\n1.Correct");
                score += 1;
                displayScore(score);
            } else if (india.isChecked()) {
                answerButton.append("\n1.India Wrong");
            }
            if (kl.isChecked() && selangor.isChecked()) {
                answerButton.append("\n4.Please select one");
            } else if (kl.isChecked()) {
                answerButton.append("\n4.Kuala Lumpur Correct");
                score += 1;
                displayScore(score);
            } else if (selangor.isChecked()) {
                answerButton.append("\n4.Selangor Wrong");
            }
            if (answer.getText().toString().trim().equals("ASIA")) {
                answerButton.append("\n2.Asia Correct");
                score += 1;
                displayScore(score);
            }
            if (correctAnswer.isChecked()) {
                Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), "Your answer is correct!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
                score += 1;
                displayScore(score);
            } else{
                score -= 1;
                displayScore(score);
                Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), "Your answer is wrong!", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show();
            }

            Toast.makeText(getApplicationContext(), answerButton.toString(), Toast.LENGTH_LONG).show();
        }

    });

the logcat says:
